description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCurrentLocale()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Bridges: Method removeProductList must have `public function delete<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionDeleteCriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature. https://spryker.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CORE/pages/478052552/Application+Namespace+Conventions#ApplicationNamespaceConventions-Facade
